title: Rotor gears up for gravel with new Q rings for Shimano GRX & SRAM AXS eTap cranksets
content:
If you’re looking for some new chainrings for gravel, you’re in luck. Rotor just announced a few new options geared towards the odd BCDs of Shimano GRX and SRAM AXS eTap cranksets. Shimano GRX For those still pushing a 2x group, Rotor is offering two different chainring sets for GRX crankst. Thanks to the unique […]

The post Rotor gears up for gravel with new Q rings for Shimano GRX & SRAM AXS eTap cranksets appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
